usage: Strength training and general fitness workouts at home or in small gyms, using different dumbbell weights stored on a compact rack.
key_features: Steel dumbbells in three weight levels: 1.5, 2, and 2.5
Includes a compact black stand/rack for storage
Printed weight number on each dumbbell end
ai_description: A compact dumbbell set featuring three chrome-finished steel pairs marked 1.5, 2 and 2.5 on the ends, resting on a black, tree-shaped plastic rack. The rack has curved cradles on each side and a central cutout, neatly organizing all six dumbbells in a small footprint.
target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners to intermediate lifters, and people wanting a compact dumbbell set with stand.
product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Steel Dumbbell With Stand 12kg (1.5kg+2kg+2.5kg Pair)
